Text:
Thanks 20-40.

Happy New Year.

Cheers
Jon
many thanks 2040 - can you do The League?

I'm confused. Aren't these supposed to be episodes 12 & 13?
Or am I wrong?

@boom777: Source tvrage dot com:
4x11 23/Nov/2009
4x12 30/Nov/2009
4x13 04/Jan/2010
4x14 04/ Jan/2010
4x15 11/ Jan/2010
4x16 18/ Jan/2010

It looks fine to me.

@yinzer: "The League" WAS in my Schedule on name-not-to-be-spoken for a month. Interest was so incredibly low, that T.L - like many other shows - pushed themselves out - for good.
I see no point in spending time, resources and money for maybe dozen people who even  haven't bothered to say plain "Thanks".
However, I've found episodes I have ( 1st is double, that 2-4) and I'll re-up these as "1-4 package" few hours from now.

Sorry, 1st one is not double-lenght, just longer than other ones and longer than "standard".

@sanyam: Thank you.

Okay, thanks for clearing that up.
I got confused from reading the Wikipedia page for the episode list.
Keep uploading! It is appreciated!
Torrent for "The League" 1-4 was up for two hours, but seems like nobody have interest. Well, I knew it - and have deleted that torrent right now.
The MAN "Twentyforty" is back and has done it again. We salute you
